ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
n: Sliced Tomatoes with Fresh Herb Dressing
des: "Enjoy this easy and delicious summer garden treat with no cooking involved! I serve this at  church dinners and never have enough. If you can make this a few hours in advance, the flavors become even better."
ins: Arrange the tomato slices in a shallow casserole dish. Whisk together the olive oil, thyme, oregano, parsley, chives, and garlic in a small bowl. Add salt and pepper to taste. Pour herb mixture over the tomatoes, covering evenly. Top with Parmesan cheese. Cover, and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
